title: Where is live chat at?
body: I cant find live chat at times, and other times its there, why is this?

replies.body: Live Chat has been an experimental venue, so hours will vary.  We don't have a schedule for it currently, but you can double check at the [ticket center ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)when reaching out for support.

Live chat is exactly that. It's when there is someone available for immediate assistance. If nobody is there able to help immediately, then I doubt they would leave the option there and have people waiting for someone who isn't even there. They're only human.
